reviewText: Wonderful.  I am a huge Liz Curtis Higgs fan

Vhs came real quick, much quicker than we had expected... excellent. Though the sound on the second half of the tape is destorted and you have to have it turned right up to hear it then it goes loud again. That part we are NOT so thrilled with. But hey.
Great tape to watch though.

The first time I saw this video was at a weekend retreat for my sisters and cousins.  We all enjoyed it so much I ordered a copy for myself.  I gave two programs to two differnet groups of ladies and both groups left with much high self esteem.
  Liz is certainly right on target about us women and makes our bond stronger with understanding and humor.
If you're looking for a good laugh buy this video(if you can find it) or you can go to my web site [...] and check out "Things That Make Me Nuts," for laughs too.
